attributes.title: OMGGGGG EWWWWW NEVER AGAIN 😡😡😡
attributes.review:
So this app took about an week to download I am
Mad and upset about that I don’t even no how you are President I like can’t even I don’t no who put you in the chair you are a disgrace to the world and you got the nerve trying to band TikTok grow tf up trump

attributes.title: This was actually horrible.
attributes.review: Our president deserves better. The app was hard to navigate and had lots of glitches. It needs improvement. 0/10

attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLAND
attributes.review: You can’t access any of the features unless you provide your phone number and agree to receiving messages. This has got to be a conspiracy by the Chinese government to steal my information. FAKE app!

attributes.title: Just bad
attributes.review: Every time I go to open the app it crashes and just looking at the screen makes my eyes hurt. Needs loads of improvement 🧚🏼‍♀️✨ maybe start by deleting it 🦋💕

attributes.title: Just no
attributes.review: Wouldn’t recommend getting this app, it’s a literal dumpster fire. Tried opening it when my phone just started bursting into flames . And it only stopped when I deleted it.

attributes.title: Poorly designed
attributes.review: Crashes frequently and is a pain to deal with. There are a lot of better apps just like this one out there, don’t bother with this one

attributes.title: Terrible information
attributes.review: I got the app and it had such false and terrible information. This app is absolutely horrible. They are justifying racism and lgbtq hatred. I couldn’t believe what I was reading. For the love of all humanity never get this app.

attributes.title: WORST APP EVER 🤢🤢
attributes.review: It took almost a year for it to download like bro and I’m like so mad 😡 and I don’t like how it’s made it’s so bad like I don’t like it the way they programmed it is soooooo bad. Like it really has a bunch of old trump boomers and the way it has them on there is DISGOTInG DO NOT DOWNLOAD 🤢🤢🤢🤢

attributes.title: Dangerous
attributes.review: This app is DANGEROUS. I was trying to walk down a ramp while accessing the app. You have to understand, I was wearing leather shoes - it was slippery as ice. Suffice to say, my body - and, more importantly, my reputation - were permanently damaged by the combination of that ramp and this app. Do NOT download, it is bigly dangerous

attributes.title: DOWNLOADING WAS A MISTAKE
attributes.review: This app is the worst thing that ever happened to me! When I got on it my phone screen turned green and then my phone died at 90 percent!! It ruined my phone and I’m now permanently traumatized because I have a phobia of the color green!!!!!😣😭👺😡
